name: Item Juggler
description:
GMTK's 2020 Game Jam: Out of Control

Item Juggler is a turn-based dungeon crawler puzzle game. Your inventory is out of control and the item you are holding is changing every turn.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

E or Space Bar to use items

Walk into chests and keys to get them

Walk into enemies with a weapon to damage them

Shields protect you from projectiles
